sentences.sentence: Radioisotopes have a vital role to play in modern medicine.
sentences.translation: 放射性同位素在现代医学中占有重要位置。

sentences.sentence: All radioisotopes are prepared in this way, or by other methods of remote control.
sentences.translation: 所有的放射性同位素都是用这种方法或其它遥控法制备的。

sentences.sentence: Certain radioisotopes can also be administered to treat certain cancers such as thyroid cancer.
sentences.translation: 管理的某些放射性同位素也可以治疗某些癌症，如甲状腺癌。
